Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
-- Created by Hein Ferman
06.01.2014 JH SCR18565 Removed BankID and Bank account number (only from screen)
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.02.2013 GB SCR17982 Button Delete cheque(s): Added the test Booked cheques cannot be deleted
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
27.04.2011 GB SCR16397 Changed condition for allow update the
CHQE_HYPA_ID, CHQE_HYPA_DEPARTMENT, CHQU_NUMBERANNEXESTOSCAN
19.04.2011 JH SCR16375 Added GB406.PI.BANK_ADMNO
01.03.2011 SH SCR16238 Added new admin currency logic (removed GNRL_CURRENCY)
16.04.2010 GB SCR15473 Changed calculation for CHQE_EXCHGRATEPROV,
CHQE_AMOUNTCURRGNRL, CHQE_AMOUNTCURRCLNT, CHQE_AMOUNTCURRACC
06.02.2009 GB SCR14368 Replaced 'F2'Kbd by RaiseEvent = Cancel
26.07.2007 SH SCR11925 Adjusted argument list of client selection program
07.11.2005 SH SCR9415 Added new field --> CHQE_LEGALCOLLECTION (not screen)
30.03.2005 SH SCR7917 Fixed bug, new fields were not updated to DB
10.03.2005 SH SCR7917 Added new CHQE/CHQU fields (not to screen, only DB updates
08.11,.2004 EE SCR#7274 add field CHQE_QHQU_UNITDATE
10.12.03 BT SCR5011 field CHQE_CLNTNO for new row not init (see ONLINE)
28.10.2003 BT SCR4580 initialize field CHQE_COUNTRYDEBTOR with NULL()
20.07.2003 BT SCR3983 the check (see changedate 19.08.2002 SCR1932 SH)
This check is only for GNRL_CODE = DE and CHQE_COUNTRYDEBTOR = NULL()
therefore not for foreign cheques in Germany.
16.06.2003 SH SCR3777 Implemented new test "Client has END status -
- paymenthandling not allowed"
26.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
19.08.2002 SCR1932 SH Add new check CHQE_BANKIDDEBTOR must be >9999999 and
- < 100000000 for GNRL_CODE = DE (only for country Germany)
-- 04.07.2002 SH Add message if the total amount of all entered cheques is
- unequal to the total amunt of the cheque unit
-- SCR#412 --> OK,11.12.2001 (scanningpart implemented)
-- SCR#837 19.02.2002 SH (Removed part Scan prepare, diff. changes)
